channel.title: Simplicity is a form of art... - virtual

item.title: Uploading selinuxnode test VM
item.description: At the time of writing (but I'll delay the publication of this post a few hours), I'm uploading a new SELinux-enabled KVM guest image. This is not an update on the previous image though (it's a reinstalled system - after all, I use VMs for testing, so it makes sense to â€¦
item.dc:creator: Sven Vermeulen
